name: Firelight Tsuchinoko
text: If this card is Special Summoned: all "Firelight" monsters you control gain 500 ATK. During the End Phase, if this card was destroyed this turn: add 1 "Firelight" card from your Deck to your hand.
pendulum_text: You can destroy this card in the scale to Ritual Summon 1 Level 4 "Firelight" from your hand or face-up in the Extra Deck.
